sql-case.value: GRANT CREATE ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW, ALTER ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW, DROP ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW TO user1
GRANT CREATE SESSION TO user1, user2
GRANT role1, role2 TO user1, user2
GRANT SELECT ON ds_0.t_order TO user1
GRANT INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ds_0.t_order TO user1
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ds_0.t_order TO user1
GRANT SELECT ON ds_0.t_order TO user1, user2
GRANT SELECT (order_id) ON ds_0.t_order TO user1
GRANT INHERIT PRIVILEGES ON user1 TO user2
GRANT role1, role2 TO FUNCTION ds_0.function1, FUNCTION ds_0.function2
